task.title: Disabling passwordless secure administration by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can disable passwordless secure administration of the appliance by using the command line.

context.p: You can disable passwordless secure administration of the appliance, by using the command user sshkey delete.

step.cmd: To disable passwordless secure administration, enter the following command:

info.note: The command must be capitalized as shown.

example.codeblock: user sshkey delete Deleting ssh public key file for user admin. Ok.
